label: 忌倉
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A storehouse (kura) in which was kept all the property of the Imperial Family. Later only those articles used in the worship of the Deities (Kami) were kept in it, while all other things were placed in the Imperial Storehouse (Uchikura ). [神、内倉]
